DC CODE ยง 5-1501.14

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Department's delivery of forensic science services to agencies, including the timeliness of service; and
The general effectiveness of the Department in the furtherance of its agency mission; and
Advise the Mayor and the Council, as it considers necessary, on matters relating to the Department or forensic science.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)
